content: One way to connect with current or former students and get their thoughts on the program is to consider joining professional associations or societies related to your field of interest. These associations often have local chapters, which can be a great way to network with professionals and learn more about specific programs. You can also reach out to alumni associations or student organizations at the university you're interested in and ask if they can connect you with current or former students who may be willing to discuss their experiences with the program. Additionally, social media platforms such as LinkedIn and Twitter can also be a good way to connect with professionals and students in your field of interest and get their honest opinions about specific programs.
